permissions: Allowed for admins. Non-admins can create predictions only if they have a prediction-subject membership for the target subject.
side_effects: Creates a prediction record. May compute a continuous ranked probability score and may reset the prediction subject domain when status or probability distribution is set.
validation_notes: --prediction-subject is required. Status defaults to draft if omitted and must be one of: draft, submitted, abandoned. --probability-distribution must be valid JSON when provided; empty string clears the value. A user can have only one alive prediction per prediction subject when predicted-by is set and no prediction agent is present.

flags.name: --probability-distribution
flags.validation: Must be valid JSON when provided; payload includes class_name. An empty string clears the value.
